title: 08. The Battles of Thermopylae and Artemisium
description: Events at Thermopylae and Artemisium during the Persian invasion.

questions.question: Why was Sparta not able to send their full army to Thermopylae?
How many troops did Leonidas travel to Thermopylae with?
Where did the Greek fleet position themselves?
Which other Greek cities sent troops to Thermopylae?
options: Thebes, Thespiae, Locris, Phocis, other Peloponnesians

questions.question: Who was sent to hold a mountain pass that circumvented Thermopylae?
How many days did the Persians wait once they arrived at Thermopylae?
After two days of unsuccessful attacks, who betrayed the Greeks, revealing the mountain pass to the Persians?
Which troops remained when it was revealed the Persians were coming?
What happened while the Persians were waiting at Artemisium?
options: They were hit by a storm
They were ambushed by the Greeks

questions.question: How many Persian ships were sent to sail around Euboea?
What did the Greek fleet do upon learning of the defeat at Thermopylae?
options: They joined with the Spartan forces

questions.question: Where did the Greek fleet move to after the battle?
What did Athens do to their population after the fall of Thermopylae?
options: Sent them to the Peloponnesian coast
Evacuated most of the population to Salamis

questions.question: What did the Persians do once they arrived at Athens?
options: They sacked the city, and burned it
